attributes.action: Change Welsh A-Level and GCSE’s to predicted grades
attributes.additional_details: All signatures will be greatly appreciated. Thank you
attributes.background: As a Welsh A-Level student I feel that the way in which each nation is being assessed will impact our chances of being accepted into university. With England now being assessed using teacher predicted grades, I believe it necessary to change Welsh assessments similarly.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

The Welsh Parliament has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Parliament, you can find out more here:
https://petitions.senedd.wales/
